rate_table.notes: Brochure example for basic cover without riders

premium.rate_table_notes: Full actuarial tables not published; sample premiums from brochures and agent quotes. Premiums vary by age, health, and riders.

sample_examples.example: KES 3,000 monthly premium for KES 3M sum assured (age 18–30, no riders, marketing illustration).
KES 5,200 monthly for KES 5M sum assured (age 31–45, basic cover, estimated from agent schedules).

benefits: Optional funeral expense cover (up to KES 200,000)
Optional disability benefit (up to 100% of sum assured)
Optional critical illness rider (lump-sum on diagnosis)

exclusions: Death due to undeclared hazardous activities

claims_process.notes: Turnaround based on Britam’s stated 7-day target for complete claims (Britam Claims FAQ)

customer_reviews.comment: Smooth claims process for Tegemeo, paid within a week (@User123, Jan 2025)
Good cover but premium adjustments need clearer communication (2024)
